decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 12 (Cycle parking) of permission 22/01273/KPSID. Therefore, the submitted details would fail to ensure that appropriate opportunities to promote sustainable transport are taken up, in accordance with policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required by Condition 12 (Cycle parking) of permission 22/01273/KPSID (Demolition of existing buildings and associated structures and the erection of two storey building to provide new mental health floorspace together with ancillary and associated development including new and enhanced pedestrian routes /spaces and access, vehicular access, roads and car parking, servicing facilities, landscaping, infrastructure and other associated works)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL SB1  South of the Borough
KEYACH Tolworth Key Area of Change
